name: CHECKOUTCOM_APPLE_TITLE
label: Payment Option Title
default: Pay by Apple Pay with Checkout.com

name: CHECKOUTCOM_APPLE_MERCHANT_ID
label: Merchant ID
desc: Provide your Apple Merchant ID (eg: merchant.com.example.prestashop)

name: CHECKOUTCOM_APPLE_KEY
label: Apple Pay Key
desc: Provide Path to Apple Pay .key File (eg: /opt/applepay/certificate.key)

name: CHECKOUTCOM_APPLE_CERTIFICATE
label: Apple Pay Certificate
desc: Provide Path to Apple Pay .pem File (eg: /opt/applepay/certificate.pem)
